prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
You are certainly no friend of mine. You have accused me of lying about what you had said, and run away when I proved by actual quotation that the accusation was false. We both know that, even though you praise humility, you are not humble enough to apologize.

 You sneered at my combat experience, saying "A lot of so called "combat veterans" of Vietnam smelled more perfume from call girls than they smelled cordite" and "So when you were an Army officer in Vietnam (even though you spent your time inside of Danang airbase, with at least two battalions of infantry marines on the wire ) what was the combat load for M-16 ammo per soldier on a daily patrol?" An actual friend would not have written such things.

No, you are no friend of mine, you ignorant, arrogant, hypocritical blow-hard. You should be able to guess that I do not feel friendly towards you
stories:
It's clear that you aren't someone I would consider a friend. You falsely accused me of lying, and when I showed you the truth with direct quotes, you avoided the situation. Despite your claims of valuing humility, you haven't apologized.

Additionally, you ridiculed my military experience, making disrespectful comments like, "Many self-proclaimed 'combat veterans' from Vietnam had more encounters with call girls than cordite" and "What was the daily combat load for M-16 ammo per soldier on a patrol when you served as an Army officer in Vietnam, even though you were stationed within Danang airbase with two infantry marine battalions on the perimeter?" A genuine friend would not say such things.

In truth, I can tell that you and I are not on friendly terms, given your ignorance, arrogance, hypocrisy, and boastful nature.

Your actions indicate that I cannot count you as a friend. You wrongly accused me of dishonesty, and when presented with evidence to the contrary, you did not address it. Despite your stated emphasis on humility, you have not offered an apology.

Furthermore, you have shown disrespect for my military background, making disparaging remarks such as, "A number of individuals who claim to be 'veterans of combat' from Vietnam had more interactions with prostitutes than gunpowder" and "What was the standard issue of M-16 ammunition per soldier on a patrol during your time as an Army officer in Vietnam, even though you were based at Danang airbase with two marine infantry battalions on the perimeter?" A true friend would not speak to me in this manner.

To be frank, it is apparent that our relationship is not amicable, given your lack of knowledge, arrogance, hypocrisy, and boastful demeanor.

The way you have acted suggests that I cannot view you as a friend. You have falsely accused me of being dishonest, and when confronted with proof that contradicts this, you have failed to acknowledge it. Although you claim to value humility, you have not apologized.

Moreover, you have shown a lack of respect for my military experience, making derogatory comments such as, "Many people who call themselves 'Vietnam War veterans' had more contact with prostitutes than gunpowder" and "What was the typical amount of M-16 ammunition issued to each soldier during a patrol when you served as an Army officer in Vietnam, even though you were stationed at Danang airbase with two marine infantry battalions on the outskirts?" A genuine friend would not speak to me in this way.

To be clear, it is obvious that our relationship is not positive, given your ignorance, arrogance, hypocrisy, and boastful attitude.

The manner in which you have behaved implies that I cannot consider you a friend. You have wrongly accused me of being deceitful, and when presented with evidence that disproves this, you have not admitted to it. Despite claiming to value humility, you have not apologized.

Furthermore, you have demonstrated a lack of regard for my military background, making disparaging remarks such as, "A number of individuals who identify as 'Vietnam War veterans' had more interactions with prostitutes than gunpowder" and "Could you tell me how much M-16 ammunition was typically given to each soldier during a patrol when you served as an Army officer in Vietnam, even though you were based at Danang airbase with two marine infantry battalions on the outskirts?" A true friend would not speak to me in this manner.

To be straight forward, it is evident that our relationship is not healthy, given your ignorance, arrogance, hypocrisy, and boastful demeanor.

A genuine friend would not communicate with me in this manner.
